mdRecord.dcterms:title: Chatelaine case and instruments
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Becton-Dickinson [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Nurse's chatelaine case. Belonged to Anna Thompson Stoudt and was designed for 11 instruments; includes: bandage scissors, hemostatic forceps, probe pointed director, clinical thermometer, female catheter, baby scale, and needle. The case belonged to Anna Thompson Stoudt, RN, who worked as a pediatric nurse at the Toronto Sick Children's Hospital and a hospital in Reading, PA. [original]
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff. [original]
Donated by Mr. and Mrs. Ralph J. Stoudt, Jr. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments and apparatus
